interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: PUEEN 168 Nail Stamping Plates Synthetic Leather Holder Case Organizer in Blue Rose Lace Pattern-BH000006
Review Date: 2015/07/22
Store: PUEEN
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {}
Review Text: Use this with my bmc and other plates. I haven't had any issues with it. The front feels nice, I like the texture.  Zipper works smooth. No obvious defects, sewing issues, etc. No nauseating smells when I  got it. Plastic has a smooth feel to it that I like, doesn't feel cheap. Holds plates pretty well. Turn it upside down and shake it,  yeah, you get some slipping.  I haven't had any slide out, and I've accidentally carried it around upside down quite a lot, dropped it and in one stunning display of clumsiness - I  managed to drop it, then kick it across the room, picked it up only to drop it from chest high. Sigh. And all the plates were STILL in place, and this thing is holding up quite well. Really happy with it. Recommend!
Review Title: I love it, works great with my plates
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Maniology (formerly bmc) Peel-able Temporary Short Wear Swatching Nail Lacquer Gel Polish Base Coat b.m.c {'Brand': 'B.m.c', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '1.1 x 1.1 x 2.6 inches', 'Item Weight': '0.05 Pounds', 'Product Dimensions': '1.1 x 1.1 x 2.6 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '708302916301'} Read reviews and thought this would be great. Not so for me. Clean release on some of my nail, and damaged the crap out of the lower 2/3. They looked like I had pried off acrylics. I nearly cried. I took a fine file to them, and the damage wasn't quite so bad, except for one nail. My left thumb was badly damaged. It took weeks to grow out the damage.
This, however, works ok with my teenagers nails, as she likes to peel off her nails if she gets bored (eeek) and this actually keeps her nails from being damaged. So, for her nails, its a 5, for mine, it was a 1, so I rated it thusly. Not impressed for me, works on others PUEEN 168 Nail Stamping Plates Synthetic Leather Holder Case Organizer in Blue Rose Lace Pattern-BH000006 PUEEN {} Use this with my bmc and other plates. I haven't had any issues with it. The front feels nice, I like the texture. Zipper works smooth. No obvious defects, sewing issues, etc. No nauseating smells when I got it. Plastic has a smooth feel to it that I like, doesn't feel cheap. Holds plates pretty well. Turn it upside down and shake it, yeah, you get some slipping. I haven't had any slide out, and I've accidentally carried it around upside down quite a lot, dropped it and in one stunning display of clumsiness - I managed to drop it, then kick it across the room, picked it up only to drop it from chest high. Sigh. And all the plates were STILL in place, and this thing is holding up quite well. Really happy with it. Recommend! I love it, works great with my plates
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user maintains a strong interest in nail care products, especially those that allow for easy application and removal. Recent interactions reflect a broader acceptance of supportive tools and organizers related to nail care.
- **Experience Variability:** Their experience can vary significantly based on individual needs, highlighting a preference for products that demonstrate reliability and consistency, especially in a communal context.
- **Sensitivity to Damage:** The user remains sensitive to nail damage and prioritizes the health of their nails. They continue to seek out items that mitigate the risk of harm, emphasizing safety in all purchases.
- **Family Usage Consideration:** They consider family preferences in product trials, often evaluating how products meet their own needs alongside those of their teenagers, maintaining a focus on usability for all family members.
- **Balanced Rating System:** The user employs a dual-rating system, reflecting their analytical approach. They assess products based on personal and familial effectiveness, indicating a nuanced understanding of product performance across varied user experiences.
- **Rating Influence:** Their satisfaction is closely linked to both individual performance and overall functionality, showcasing a thoughtful balance between personal experience and broader usability observations.

Overall, the user exhibits a discerning yet adaptable approach to beauty-related products, valuing safety, functionality, and family-friendliness in their selections.
